titles.title: A bill to provide for the repurchase of land taken by eminent domain, by Native American organizations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3224)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator Glenn without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 719.

bill.summary: 3/17/1994--Introduced. Amends the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to provide for the repurchase of land taken by eminent domain from organizations that had held such land in trust for Native Americans.
